description:
Not every adventure goes according to plan. This Composite Softshell Jacket is second quality as the pockets are missing stitching that prevents the zipper car from sliding off (so we're offering them at a discount for you to enjoy). Handy with a sewing kit? A couple well-placed stitches and you’re in business. If tailoring isn’t your thing, don’t worry, because the handwarmer pockets are just as cozy with or without the zipper. Stormfleece® fabric insulates against the chill and breathes for comfort. It also has a bit of stretch for easy movement. Due to the seconds quality, this garment is final sale.

  • Plush Stormfleece® fabric has a high warmth-to-weight ratio
  • Fabric has 4-way stretch for full mobility
  • Dual zippered handwarmer pockets. (missing bar-tack stitching, zipper cars may slide off)
  • Elastic hem, cuffs and high collar seal out drafts
  • Regular fit wears like an old favourite
  • Due to the seconds quality, this garment is final sale and not eligible for returns under the Rocksolid Guarantee
name: MEC Composite Softshell Jacket *Seconds - Men's
